name: Thailand

major_cities.name: Bangkok
major_cities.description: The vibrant capital city with rich history, modern attractions, and world-class cuisine

major_cities.name: Chiang Mai
major_cities.description: Cultural heart of Northern Thailand with ancient temples and mountain scenery

major_cities.name: Phuket
major_cities.description: Thailand's largest island with stunning beaches and vibrant nightlife

major_cities.name: Krabi
major_cities.description: Province known for dramatic limestone cliffs and pristine beaches

major_cities.name: Koh Samui
major_cities.description: Tropical paradise island with luxury resorts and coconut groves

major_cities.name: Pattaya
major_cities.description: Coastal resort city with entertainment and water activities

flight.description: Extensive domestic network with major airlines

train.description: Comfortable rail travel operated by State Railway of Thailand

bus.description: Affordable bus services connecting all major cities

travel_tips.best_time: November to April (dry season) offers the best weather for travel across Thailand
travel_tips.transport: Book transport in advance during peak season (Dec-Mar). Use official websites for best prices
travel_tips.booking: Book flights 30-60 days in advance for best prices. Bus tickets available 30 days ahead
travel_tips.customs: Respect local customs, dress modestly at temples, and remove shoes when entering homes

meta_description: Discover the best travel routes in Thailand. Find flights, trains, buses and ferries between Bangkok, Chiang Mai, Phuket, Krabi and more. Plan your perfect Thailand trip with our comprehensive transport guide.
page_title: Travel to Thailand - Best Routes, Destinations & Transport Guide

social_media.facebook_title: Travel to Thailand - Complete Transport Guide
social_media.facebook_description: Plan your trip to Thailand with our comprehensive transport guide. Find the best routes between cities.
